name: A Day in the Afterlife of Sisyphus
name_original: A Day in the Afterlife of Sisyphus
description:
You play as the Legendary King Sisyphus and You have been punished by the lord of the Underworld Hades for cheating Death not once but twice. 

And your punishment, to push a Boulder up a Mountain, which doesn't sound hard right? Haha WRONG! This Mountain is riddled with Divine Magic that makes the journey to the top almost futile! But of course no magic is stronger  then Sisyphus's will to live. Can you defy fate and reach the top? Or will fail and fall to the firey pits of failure? 

Controls 

Spacebar: Move

Escape: Pause
